snippet: The case, involving the death of 7-year-old Maria Ridulph, was one of the oldest unsolved crimes to eventually get to court in the United States.
lead_paragraph: The case, involving the death of 7-year-old Maria Ridulph, was one of the oldest unsolved crimes to eventually get to court in the United States.

headline.main: Man Convicted in 1957 Murder of Girl
headline.print_headline: Man Convicted in 1957 Murder of Girl
